ModMetaData.TIPS:
You can specify no more than 35 mods GitGud loads about 1 mod/second, so try to mix mods order in modlist to make the launcher load faster. Check that the links looks like https://[resource]/[owner]/[repository_name] An extra empty string or "/" at the end of link may break the program. Do not change anything except modlist for stable work. I cannot guarantee reliability when working with other mods, but in theory everything would work as it should. RimworldHugsLib and ModManager problems
INSTALLED GIT MAKES DOWNLOAD MUCH FASTER!!! INSTALL AND TURN IT ON (from False to True in this file in gitcheck) CHECK NAME OF GAME DOWN TO THIS FILE! OR WRONG GAME NAME WILL BREAK THE APP WHEN YOU PRESS START GAME!
